com.slaterama.qslib.alpha.support.v4.app

Class RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.slaterama.qslib.alpha.support.v4.app.RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
    Enclosing class:
    RetainedInstanceManager

    public static class RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    A retained Fragment associated with this RetainedInstanceManager. This fragment is added to the FragmentManager established by this RetainedInstanceManager and is used to store retained values and class instances across configuration changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

        android.support.v4.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.support.v4.app.Fragment.SavedState

        private java.util.Map<RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedSystemInstanceKey,RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedSystemInstanceValue> mRetainedSystemInstanceMap
